name: Tarantula #22
description: The nocturnal artist of the Tarantula Tribe.
backstory: Under the cover of darkness, this purple-hued artist creates masterpieces using moonlight and shadow. Their large, soulful eyes see beauty in the most unexpected places, and their delicate leg work transforms simple silk into stunning works of art. The tribe whispers that their webs capture not just prey, but dreams themselves.
